Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory352.jpg'}
{1: "Principal's Office", 2: 'Gestrig Academy'}
{3: "Upon returning from City 141, you receive a notice to report to the Principal's Office."}
{3: 'Martha sits behind a spacious desk, the overhead light splitting her face into light and shadow, obscuring her expression.'}
{3: 'She pulls out a chair, pushing a document marked with red text toward you.'}
{3: "Without a doubt, it's the delayed punishment for your battlefield insubordination."}
{3: "Repeatedly defying established investigative protocols isn't a good choice. Whatever the punishment might be, it's best to accept it for now."}
{2: '(Sit down and sign the document)', 3: '17'}
{3: "You hand back the document, but Martha doesn't immediately take it, instead continuing to flip through other materials."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martha', 3: 'No intention to explain yourself or offer a defense?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I don't understand what you mean, ma'am.", 3: '24'}
{2: 'Martha', 3: 'I thought you would use your battlefield performance as a bargaining chip.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Martha', 3: "After all, your involvement ensured the students' safety during the battle—far exceeding what's expected of a teacher.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Martha deliberately emphasizes the word "teacher," her statement carrying a pointed implication.'}
{2: "(Don't give a direct answer)", 3: '28'}
{2: 'Are you suggesting my merits could offset my misconduct and exempt me from punishment?', 3: '29'}
{2: 'Martha', 3: 'Of course not.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Martha's tone suddenly turns serious."}
{2: 'Martha', 3: 'The notion that merits can offset misconduct is a social convention that has no place in schools. Students need to learn about right and wrong in absolute terms.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Martha', 3: "If we allow students to view right and wrong as variables on opposite sides of an equation, their actions will shift from pursuing what's right to merely balancing the moral ledger.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Martha', 3: 'This is deeply misleading logic, especially for our students.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Martha raises her head, meeting your gaze. Despite her white hair and wrinkles, the dignified resolve in her eyes remains unmistakable.'}
{2: 'Martha', 3: 'Good results cannot conceal improper conduct, just as poor outcomes cannot entirely invalidate noble intentions.', 4: '1'}
{3: "[What about you...? What's your purpose behind all of this?]"}
{3: 'The challenge remains unvoiced, concluding her cryptic lecture.'}
{3: 'Knock, knock—'}
{3: 'The abrupt knocking shatters the tense atmosphere in the room.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Martha frowns toward the door and lets out a soft grunt, yet her demeanor noticeably softens.'}
{2: 'Martha', 3: "That's enough for today. Return to your class, Teacher 【kuroname】.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huh? What about the punishment...', 3: '47'}
{3: 'Martha buries herself in her books, not bothering to look up.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Martha', 3: 'According to the relevant regulations, teaching credentials should be revoked from instructors who disobey orders during special circumstances, with suspension pending investigation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Martha', 3: 'Before that can happen, we need to complete other procedures in recognition of your protecting the students.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Martha's tone remains serious, but with a subtle reduction in its severity."}
{2: 'Martha', 3: "Go fulfill your duties as a teacher for now. Don't keep your students waiting too long.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Martha', 3: "As for the punishment, you'll receive it when the time comes.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Understanding Martha's implied attitude, you thank her and take your leave."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory369.png'}
{1: '1', 3: "As you close the door to the principal's office, you notice a figure peering cautiously from around the corner."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Oh, you're out already?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Did that old hag give you a hard time?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Be respectful to your teachers.', 3: '74'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "But she is an old hag! When Ewig reported to her, her first reaction wasn't happiness, and she snapped that she would hold you responsible.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Because she was worried about all of you.', 3: '77'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Who? The old hag? No way! That's impossible!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'No sooner are the words spoken than a deep, deliberate cough emanates through the door.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martha', 3: "You can still lose points in this week's evaluation.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Tch... Sorry to disturb you, Commander Mar-tha!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Jetavie rolls her eyes in annoyance, making faces at the closed door while tugging at your sleeve.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Let's go. Ewig says she has something to give you.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1161.jpg'}
{1: 'Student Dormitory', 2: 'Gestrig Academy'}
{3: 'Gestrig Academy Student Dormitory.'}
{3: 'Following Jetavie to the dormitory, you find Ewig deep in thought, holding a physical book in her hands.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: "I've brought 【kuroname】 back for you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ewig snaps out of it, though her expression barely changes. As your eyes meet, her pupils subtly adjust, and she extends the book in her hands toward you.'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: "White's diary. She asked me to give it to you before she left. It took me a long time to find it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: "I searched through all possible storage areas under White's access permissions, but found nothing.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Ewig', 3: "It wasn't until staff members cleaned out her dormitory and provided an inventory that I discovered she would hide her diary in a specific location before every emergency mission.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: "That's what people do with diaries: they hide them. There's nothing strange about that.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: "Is that so? Perhaps. It's not important.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: 'Actually, I have other matters to discuss...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: '...Not important?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Jetavie abruptly interrupts Ewig's statement. A hint of confusion crosses Ewig's otherwise detached expression."}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: 'In terms of priority, this indeed falls under...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "This is White's diary, the only thing she left behind!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: "That's why I've been trying to find it to fulfill her wishes. It's just that it was hidden differently than I expected, which caused a slight delay.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: "If this is what you're upset about, it is indeed my mistake.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "That's not what I'm talking about! I'm angry because you think White's diary isn't important!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Ewig responds with bewilderment, her answer coming across as completely matter-of-fact.'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: 'We have system logs, which are more convenient and efficient and less likely to be lost.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alright, Jetavie, calm down.', 3: '137'}
{2: 'Ewig, what were those other matters you mentioned?', 3: '138'}
{3: "With visible indignation, Jetavie sets Ewig down. Ewig furrows her brow, not angry, but simply confused and unable to comprehend the purpose behind Jetavie's actions."}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: 'I would like to borrow your permission to visit City 141 during a time when there is no emergency.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Ewig', 3: 'As the frequency of Corrupted invasions increases and our sample size expands, the data analysis modules of several students, including myself, have reached similar conclusions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: 'There are anomalies in the attacks on City 141—the Corrupted invasions appear to have some purpose.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: 'However, we have too few data points and insufficient information to draw any more useful leads.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before Ewig can respond, Jetavie jumps in.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Is that how you ask someone for a favor?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Or do you think handing over White's diary to 【kuroname】 counts as enough of a favor already?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ewig', 3: 'Why would you think that? That was between them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: "You're right, though. One should give before taking—that's just common sense.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ewig nods thoughtfully.'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: 'What do I need to give you in return for borrowing your access?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I don't need anything. I'll help you.", 3: '161'}
{2: "Because I'm your teacher.", 3: '163'}
{2: 'Also... you should apologize to White.', 3: '166'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: 'Is that a condition?', 4: '1'}
{2: "No, it's just a suggestion. It has nothing to do with granting you access...", 3: '169'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: "...White, I'm sorry.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Before finishing her sentence, Ewig turns around and bows deeply toward White's dormitory, causing you to freeze in place with the diary still in your hand."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ewig', 3: "Is this how it's supposed to work?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She sighs once more and lightly taps Ewig on the forehead.'}
{3: 'Ewig covers her forehead, appearing confused, yet remains standing perfectly still, as if waiting for an answer.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: "...Ewig, you're absolutely hopeless.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'She probably just needs a little more time to understand...', 3: '189'}
{2: "That's good enough. When do we depart?", 3: '190'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: 'Ready whenever.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she speaks, Ewig glances at Jetavie beside her and adds a follow-up.'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: 'Thank you, Teacher.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory143.png'}
{1: 'Transit Gateway', 2: 'City 141'}
{3: 'City 141 Transit Gateway'}
{3: 'Amidst synthetic voice system announcements, you lead Jetavie and Ewig out of the train car and onto the platform.'}
{1: '1', 3: "You glance back at Ewig following behind you. She's merely looking around, observing her surroundings with no apparent intention of taking the lead."}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: "What's wrong?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Where do we go next?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: "I don't know.", 4: '2'}
{2: "...Didn't you say you had suspicions?", 3: '216'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: 'Yes, I think the Corrupted invasion has a specific purpose, which is why we came to look around the city.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: "But I don't know how to search for relevant clues. There are too many possibilities, which is essentially the same as having nothing.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: 'Do you have any ideas?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Jetavie is at a loss for words. As she tries to formulate a response, her intense demeanor unintentionally frightens a small child nearby.'}
{2: 'Gentle Mother', 3: "Oh, don't cry, don't cry.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The woman lifts the infant into her arms, gently rocking back and forth while tenderly patting its back with her palm.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Um... sorry about that.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gentle Mother', 3: "*chuckles* It's quite alright. I recognize you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gentle Mother', 3: 'When the Corrupted attacked, my husband and I were with her near the shopping mall in the city center...', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm surprised there was a shopping mall here...", 3: '234'}

{2: 'Gentle Mother', 3: 'You must be from outside, sir. When Leibowitz Company took over this area, they built the shopping mall in City 141. It served as a place for people to exchange supplies and run small businesses.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gentle Mother', 3: "Back then, we were near the mall buying supplies... When the buildings started collapsing, I was terrified. That's when you all appeared.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The woman smiles, gently lifting the baby's hand toward Jetavie while softly cooing to the infant."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gentle Mother', 3: "There, there, don't cry. Big sister over here is the hero that saved you, don't you remember?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Baby', 3: 'Waa... wah?'}
{3: "The baby's emotions shift as quickly as they came. Under the mother's comforting words, the crying gradually subsides."}
{3: "The baby's eyes widen with sudden curiosity as it gazes at Jetavie, stretching its tiny hand out even further."}
{3: 'After Jetavie sees this, her face tenses with uncertainty and her usual spirited demeanor is gone as she cautiously extends a finger to touch the baby.'}
{2: 'Gentle Mother', 3: 'She seems to really like you. Would you like to hold her?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Jetavie turns around, casting a pleading look for help.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ewig', 3: "Need help? If you don't want to, I can do it.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Of course I want to!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Jetavie immediately objects, then carefully takes the baby in her arms.'}
{2: 'Baby', 3: 'Ee-yah... ee-ee-'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Hey hey, don't... don't wiggle... don't wiggle...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Everyone expects Jetavie to quickly return the baby to the mother, but she carefully cradles him until he drifts into sleep.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Here... he's fallen asleep.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gentle Mother', 3: 'Thank you. I hope fate brings us together again.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The mother thanks her and leaves. Jetavie responds mechanically and remains clearly lost in thought.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ewig', 3: 'Are you having a hard time letting go? Want me to call her back so you can hold the baby a little longer?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Just stop. It's irritating hearing you talk.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: '...I was thinking about something else.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Jetavie presses her lips together in thought, an unusual gesture for her.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Tell me... what do you think our "childhood" was like?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Did anyone ever hold us like that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: 'According to the timeline, an individual at that stage would still be in the cognitive cultivation phase with no physical form.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "...What a waste of time. Let's focus on the task at hand instead.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Do you have any thoughts, 【kuroname】?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Watching the woman's retreating figure, certain words she spoke trigger something important in your mind."}
{2: "Let's check out the shopping mall first.", 3: '301'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Huh? Wait a second, don't just go along with that!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Why go to the mall? Don't tell me it's because of something the baby's mom just said.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "That's way too random.", 4: '2'}
{2: "It's not exactly a random choice...", 3: '311'}
{3: "You take White's diary from your pocket, open the cover, and run your finger across the title page."}
{1: "Martha allowed us to unwind in City 141. This was the first time we'd ever received such an order.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: "I don't quite understand her intentions, nor do I grasp the purpose of unwinding.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: 'But I know my core is spinning rapidly. I suppose people would categorize this emotion as happiness.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: 'I am happy, and I want to write down this feeling.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: "But Ewig doesn't seem to feel the same way. She also participates in the outing, but it looks more like she's just executing orders.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: "I feel like something's not right about this, like we're making a mistake somewhere. But why do I feel this way?", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 6: '1', 7: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: 'Obedience is supposed to be a basic principle that must be followed.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: "I can't explain it clearly. No logical formula can give me the answer.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: 'But I found a piece of information.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: '"When life has things you can\'t figure out or that make you unhappy, go shopping."', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: 'I\'ve decided. I\'m going to take Ewig to the "shopping mall."', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 6: '1', 7: '1', 8: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory143.png'}
{2: 'Shopping mall...', 3: '328'}
{2: 'Do you remember this place, Ewig?', 3: '329'}
{3: 'Ewig tilts her head in confusion, her mechanical pupils rhythmically dilating and contracting.'}
{2: 'Ewig', 3: 'No, no keywords related to this place were found in my database.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's go take a look anyway.", 3: '334'}
{2: "We don't have clear leads anyway, so this should be fine, right?", 3: '335'}
